name: Nyaa.se Dark Theme
description: Riced up black-like-my-soul theme for nyaa.se. This theme uses Sazanami Gothic, but you can change the font to whatever you like.
additional_info:
Last updated 2014.06.17

v1.1.1
- Changed the drop down menu coloring so they're readable

v1.1
- Updated to hide logged in users filtered torrents

v1.0
- Fixed a lot of the things
- Adjusted colors

v0.3
- Fixed image icons not showing up on Firefox versions 26+

v0.2
- Added quotebox styles

v0.1
- Initial release

discussions.name: Having an issue with it not obeying filters
